name: Gloria Triplett
text: This is, by far, the BEST pizza I have ever eaten.  It has a unique flavor and the cheese tastes gourmet!  If you haven‚Äôt eaten it, I urge you to give it a try!  You‚Äôll be glad that you did and I‚Äôll be surprised if you don‚Äôt come back for more!

name: Sabrina
text: Order here a a lot, I live on the other side of town, they always get my order here fast and it's always still nice and hot. Giovannis thats closer to me takes over an hour and half to get my order to me while my dads gets it here in less that 30 mins. and their pizza is way better as well. I only order from my dads now.

name: Penny Preece
text: We tried for the first time and it was really delicious. The pizza was cooked perfect and so tasty. Just right amount of sauce and cheese. The cheese sticks were very yummy and cheesy. If you haven‚Äôt tried this pizza place you are really missing out. Thank you for a very yummy pizza.

name: Jennifer Morrison
text: Great, fresh salad. Libwich was AMAZING. Only complaint was I placed my order online and the kitchen didn't get it, however it was in their computer. They promptly made my order.

name: Stephanie Jiles
text: Amazing pizza place! Always friendly staff never had a pizza so fresh in my life delivered. It comes so hot I have to wait to eat it. Amazing food at good prices!

name: Karl Bustetter
text: I've had all good experiences with this place. The pizza has always been great and the service has been also. Prices are very competitive.

name: Theresa Castle
text: If I could give this pizza place a negative star I would..called and ordered a 2 topping pizza told the person that was taking the order that I wanted the pizza well done but not burnt or I will return it well guess what yep u nailed it was ‚Ä¶More

name: tyler johnson
text: Attempted to order 50 pizzas for an event with single topping. Person working there said the best they could do was $11 a pizza when I asked if they could do better they said ‚Äú I can‚Äôt give these away!‚Äù Ended up going somewhere else that was half the price and delivered. The pizza here is good but the customer service is below average

name: Cindy Burkett
text: The customer service is always above and beyond the usual standards of the other pizza places. It is always clean and well kept, and the food (really doesn't matter what you order) is delicious. You'd never go wrong ordering from My Dad's Pizzaria! No one can stop me from recommending this establishment to everyone!

name: Andrew Patrick
text: I've eaten here a few times. So far my food has always been perfect. The staff has been super friendly. It's always a joy.

name: Jade Spencer
text: Amazing food. Sooo good. The best I‚Äôve ever had! & the staff is sooo nice!

name: Noah Adams
text: Crust on pizza and chopsticks were very undercooked and doughy. Made my whole family sick.  Service was good thought but please pleaseee learn to cook your dough better. üò´

name: Jeremy Mckenzie
text: Like Giovanni's but skankier.   Love it!  Better prices as well

name: Rebecca Robinette
text: Ordered a 4 topping pizza told 25 minutes was ready on time. Not much cheese on it! Crust didn‚Äôt look done. Not brown on the bottom at all. edge not crispy or crunchy. Giving a medium rating. Have had better

name: Gurvin Pennington
text: Ordered from my dads for the past seven months never had a problem until today the food that they brought to my house today was not worth the money I paid for it was sloppy they made it wrong and where my nephew a special-needs I made his ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Greenlees
text: Excellent antipasto!!! Quick, friendly.

name: Robin Jessie
text: Very good food!!! The employees are very professional and friendly. Will definitely be regulars there.

name: Linda Wells
text: Great pizzas every single time!!

name: April Jo
text: Best pizza in town. The other one is too greasy, and they just throw it together.

name: Ted T
text: They don't fear the cheese! I really enjoy it when a pizza has plenty of cheese, most places skimp. The sauce is a little bit bland but I like mine spicy so it's a personal preference. The staff was quite joyful and they all were wearing a smile. Was told 20 minutes and they had my order ready in exactly that time.

name: Sarah Deere
text: I was really excited to be able to get My Dad's in Ashland. Ordered 2 pizzas with pepperoni and extra cheese. Pizzas weren't even cooked enough and they put so much cheese on it that it had turned into greasy, pizza soup. Tried cooking it ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike rainbolt
text: Other than not offering thin crust pizza, it's the greatest.

name: Mitchell Williams
text: Would have got 5stars but crust was tough as hell

name: Vicki Edwards
text: So happy to have a my dad‚Äôs back in Ashland very close to home. Better than the Dominos‚Äôs

name: Mary Bayes
text: We ordered a pizza with 4 toppings . They brought us a pizza with one topping. I called and told them . The guy on the phone said he did not believe me . that I was lying . He then said he would send me another pizza and for me to give the ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Wefenstette
text: Haven't visited there yet but I've had their pizza.  Mm Mm good, I can't wait to buy one myself.

name: Amy Evans
text: The best pizza around! I am so glad to have a location close to my home, but that also delivers.

name: JD Simpkins
text: Excellent pizza!

name: Bruce Barker
text: The pizza is awsome compatible prices the staff is nice I highly recommend them

name: T Adkins
text: Tried it for the first time. Not bad.

name: Robert Gutheridge
text: Foods amazing what more can you ask for

name: Shawn Savage
text: The best pizza and sandwiches in Ashland. Fast delivery, friendly service. I'm so happy to have My Dad's as an option for delivery now.

name: Jeffrey Burns
text: Everything I've tried was really good!

name: Faith Boyd
text: Pizza is very sloppy, not a friendly environment to be around,(kids working). I highly suggest to not waist your money, for the price you pay, you are better off going somewhere else.

name: Cheddah Cash
text: Kids working,ZERO quality,more interested in their phone and gossip than doing their job that they're PAID for.......

name: Sheila Henry
text: Great food and good prices!

name: Richard Miranda
text: Some of the best food in town

name: Connie Cutright
text: One of my favorite pizzas

name: Elizabeth Borst
text: Worst pizza, worst service, worst prices. Zanzi‚Äôs is the spot to get your pizza!

name: Angelius Katkiller
text: Good food, decent prices and friendly staff.

name: Derrick Cains
text: Good pizza

name: Carl S. Wellman, II
text: Good food

name: Peggy Conley
text: Wow My Dad's Pizzaria rocks. Great food, Great prices and most important Great location.Delicious !!

name: Hunter Gifford
text: We ordered a pizza with bacon pepperoni banana peper mushroom and when it showed up there was only pepperoni and I called back and they hung up

name: Sondra Pelfrey
text: Great pizza

name: Leslie Pope
text: So yummy!!!!
